author: @Zerozsaber
text: Hey I doubt you will see this but just in case you do I'm running through your courses and I have previous python experience. I know I can do the work that I would need to know at a job but I want to show that to people. What do you think would be a good project to show that I can do the work? How in depth or fleshed out do you think it should be?

author: @bgyw
text: Be careful, recruiters can not be always be trusted. Some actually don't send your cv or misrepresent you. They also sometimes put their own interest in priority. Just be careful in who you decide to work with.
